001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
005import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service.GameResultRepository;
008import java.util.List;
009import javax.inject.Inject;
010
011/**
012 * Handles all game results
013 */
014@HiltViewModel
015public class GameResultViewModel extends ViewModel {
016
017  private final GameResultRepository repository;
018
019  /**
020   * holds game result objects
021   * @param repository GameResultRepository
022   */
023  @Inject
024  public GameResultViewModel(GameResultRepository repository) {
025    this.repository = repository;
026  }
027
028  /**
029   * Gets all game results
030   * @return List<GameResult>
031   */
032  public LiveData<List<GameResult>> getall() {
033    return repository.getall();
034  }
035
036}
